p: During the last decade, several studies have characterized the extent of nitrate pollution and the occurrence of denitrification processes from a hydrogeological and hydrogeochemical perspectives in distinct aquifers of Catalonia (NE Spain). Five out of the ten aquifers declared vulnerable to nitrate pollution in these region, according to EU directives, have been investigated, and the results published in distinct scientific journals, PhD dissertations or technical reports (references detailed in the “ Methodology” section).
